item.description:
Report X-2024020065

  • City: DENTON

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED IN UNLOAD WITH A WHITE PLASTIC WRAP OVER THE PACKAGE THE PLASTIC TORN AND EXPOSED THE BATTERY LABEL PROMPTING AN INVESTIGATION PACKAGE WAS PLACED ON HOLD. UNDECLARED HAZMAT DISCOVERED, REWRAP; NO DAMAGE.

Report X-2024020222

  • City: ARLINGTON
  • State: TX

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: pkg fell off conveyor belt, pkg was identified leaking, was placed in hazmat bag and placed in black tote for processing. DescribePack: when pkg hit, plastic bottle cracked about 1"in length at the bottom sidewall. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: pkg was placed in Hazmat bag and then placed in Black tote for elvatuation.

item.title: Report X-2024010818
item.description:
Report X-2024010818

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-12T18:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-29
  • City: LAREDO
  • State: TX
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: While unloading a container at the LRDA location a package fell on a fiberboard box containing a class3. This caused the lid on one of the two metal cans to open and spill the contents. The cans inside were packaged with closure rings and were inside plastic bags. The contents were placed into a steel salvage package and a new declaration will be obtained for movement.
